problem_text_cn: 如图,任意四边形ABCD各边中点分别是E,F,G,H,若对角线AC,BD的长都为20cm,则四边形EFGH的周长是()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, the midpoints of each side of any quadrilateral ABCD are E, F, G, H. If the lengths of the diagonal AC and BD are all N_0, then the perimeter of the quadrilateral EFGH is ()
raw_answer: 【解答】解:∵E,F,G,H,是四边形ABCD各边中点∴HG=\frac{1}{2}AC,EF=\frac{1}{2}AC,GF=HE=\frac{1}{2}BD∴四边形EFGH的周长是HG+EF+GF+HE=\frac{1}{2}(AC+AC+BD+BD)=\frac{1}{2}×(20+20+20+20)=40cm
raw_comment: 本题考查了三角形的中位线定理,解决本题的关键是找到四边形的四条边与已知的两条对角线的关系．
